featuredAttractionsForShow: Mons. Du Pain, Well known in most parts of this country by the appellation of Anticombustible Man Salamander
The whole to conclude with a grand display of Fire-Works.
notes: Playbill features descriptions of what Mons. Du Pain will be performing, including pressing hot iron to his tongue and body, and putting red hot charcoal into his mouth.

occasions.occasionAsStated: By Permission of the Town and County Magistrates

ticketing.toBeHad: Tickets to be had of S. Barber, Printer hereof, Chamber-street
